title: The Circle fans left baffled after spotting Beth drinking tea through a straw

The Circle viewers were left baffled after seeing new girl Beth drinking tea through a straw on the latest episode of the Channel 4 reality series.

As the contestants woke up to a new day in the apartment, the narrator Sophie Willan gave a warning to fans about Beth's unusual drinking habit.

She was seen sitting in a chair holding a mug while drinking whatever was in it through a straw.

While it wasn't entirely clear what was in the mug, Sophie claimed she was drinking hot tea leaving viewers a little stunned.

(Image: Channel 4)

Taking to Twitter , fans reeled from the moment as many claimed it was enough for her to be blocked from the show.

One fan tweeted: "Who drinks a hot liquid from a cup using a straw!!!"

Another said: "Who on earth drinks tea through a straw??!!"

(Image: Channel 4)

A third agreed: "Drinking tea through a straw, no she has to go."

This was echoed by another viewer who said: "Of course Beth the wrongun drinks a brew through a straw."

A fifth viewer added: "I officially blame Beth for our oceans problems. Using straws to drink tea wtf."

(Image: Channel 4)

Those in the apartment don't currently know Beth is a catfish, with her only recently joining the game.

Beth was using someone else's photos on her profile, while, after a new twist, she has now teamed up with Jack to play as new player Joyce.

She was shown getting to know fellow newcomer Jack earlier on, with the pair flirting via a private chat.

The Circle airs all week at 10pm on Channel 4, except for Saturdays.
description: The Circle fans spotted contestant Beth drinking a cup of tea through a straw in the latest episode of the show
